briefdescription.para: This array is ment to be readonly. It's not because it is accessed very frequently.
Get or set the polygon detection type.
Will detect texture 'holes' if set to true. Slows down the detection. Default is false.
Will detect texture multiple 'solid' isles if set to true. Slows down the detection. Default is false.
Will optimize the vertex positions along the interpolated normal between two edges about a half pixel (post processing). Default is false.
Alpha (coverage) tolerance. Default is 20: Every pixel with a coverage value equal or greater to 20 will be counts as solid.

memberdef.argsstring: (byte? alphaTolerance, float? hullTolerance, bool? holeDetection, bool? multipartDetection, bool? pixelOffsetOptimization, Matrix? transform)
memberdef.name: TextureConverter

memberdef.argsstring: (uint[] data, int width, byte? alphaTolerance, float? hullTolerance, bool? holeDetection, bool? multipartDetection, bool? pixelOffsetOptimization, Matrix? transform)
memberdef.name: TextureConverter

memberdef.argsstring: (uint[] data, int? width, byte? alphaTolerance, float? hullTolerance, bool? holeDetection, bool? multipartDetection, bool? pixelOffsetOptimization, Matrix? transform)
memberdef.name: Initialize

briefdescription.para: Function to search for an entrance point of a hole in a polygon. It searches the polygon from top to bottom between the polygon edges.

simplesect.para: The next holes entrance point. Null if ther are no holes.

briefdescription.para: Searches the polygon for the x coordinates of the edges that cross the specified y coordinate.

parameterdescription.para: Y coordinate to check for edges.

simplesect.para: Descending sorted list of x coordinates of edges that cross the specified y coordinate.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vertices polygon, Vector2 coordInsideThePolygon, out int vertex1Index, out int vertex2Index)
memberdef.name: SplitPolygonEdge

memberdef.argsstring: (bool searchingForSolidPixel, ref Vector2 current, out Vector2 foundPixel)
memberdef.name: SearchNearPixels

memberdef.argsstring: (List< Vertices > detectedPolygons, Vector2 start, out Vector2? entrance)
memberdef.name: SearchNextHullEntrance

parameterdescription.para: Returns the found entrance coordinate. Null if no other shapes found.

simplesect.para: True if a new shape was found.

memberdef.argsstring: (ref Vector2 last, ref Vector2 current, out Vector2 next)
memberdef.name: GetNextHullPoint

briefdescription.para: Detects the vertices of the supplied texture data. (PolygonDetectionType.Integrated)
Detects the vertices of the supplied texture data.

parameterdescription.para: if set to true it will perform hole detection.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint[] data, int width, float hullTolerance, byte alphaTolerance, bool multiPartDetection, bool holeDetection)
memberdef.name: DetectVertices

briefdescription.para: Detects the vertices of the supplied texture data.

parameterdescription.para: if set to true it will perform hole detection.
if set to true it will perform multi part detection.
